titles.title: A joint resolution designating April 9, 1987, as "Northeastern Pennsylvania Philharmonic Appreciation Day".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 4/8/1987--Introduced. Designates April 9, 1987, as Northeastern Pennsylvania Philharmonic Appreciation Day. Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation saluting the Philharmonic for its outstanding contributions to the cultural life of northeast Pennsylvania.
